The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Musical tribute to Patsy Cline - Performers include Jessi Alexander; Mandy Barnett; Striking Matches; Emily West; Band includes Harold Bradley on tic-tac bass; Brad Albin on bass guitar, Jimmy Capps on guitar; Bob Mater on drums; Jeff Taylor on piano. Companion to a Patsy Cline exhibit.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
